overview: Min Soo and Young Joo, who are lovers, decided to arrange a two-day pension blind date for their solo friends. Min Soo takes Kyung Tae and Hyun Soo, and Young Joo brings Min Joo who was dumped by her boyfriend when he came from army and 23 year old Yeon Joo who never dated to a quiet suburban pension. In order to decide on a partner, Kyung Tae and Min Joo, Hyun Soo and Yeon Joo will pair up with each other for an hour-long date and photo shoot event and Min Soo and Young Joo will have a secret meeting in the pension.
title: King Game
